name: Fudgeball
description:
GMTK2022 submission.

Fudge dice rolls by kicking them around an arena. Score points by getting the right numbered dice into the goals.

Requires a gamepad. (Firefox has some issues on some machines. If the gamepad isn't working for you, try Chrome.)

Asset Credits:
